data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qBc3WSDUSJUQ7kNvgGT2vcH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCLmsZeOD2cEjr4aEkeQcr8F2ja_ELN_g4SBCZLqYKrpA&oe=665EF8B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=X4SWEXVWa-wQ7kNvgF9Rjq-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDmsjFudY4Khe0iNzJIxRjhPUWtg0njLuV5G953xY8jPA&oe=665F0652)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3--Wwpp2Dm8Q7kNvgFHS7AF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBj95LSZ-DN1i2FZPVVgRSMgrzwHejw13oyKEn5G39oLA&oe=665F09D0)
